item.title: MicroStrategy Quarterly Earnings: More Bitcoin Buying To Come?
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: United States based business intelligence company MicroStrategy ($MSTR) is set to report its financial results for the second quarter on Tuesday, August 1, 2023. As the world’s largest institutional investor in Bitcoin, the onus will be on the company’s earnings statement about the state of its BTC investments and its forecast for the

The post MicroStrategy Quarterly Earnings: More Bitcoin Buying To Come? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Elon Musk Gets Cryptic Invitation to Shibarium Mainnet Unveiling
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
It looks like Twitter’s former Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Elon Musk may be attending the upcoming Blockchain Futuristic Conference where Shiba Inu’s Layer-2 scaling protocol Shibarium will be officially launched.  A subtle tweet from Shiba Inu’s lead developer Shytoshi Kusama suggested that the SHIB team is likely looking forward to having Musk at the much-awaited

The post Elon Musk Gets Cryptic Invitation to Shibarium Mainnet Unveiling appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: MATIC Price to $0.8? Bullish Pattern Hints End of Correction Phase
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
The second week of July has been aggressively bearish for the crypto market as the majority of major coins witness a significant correction. As a result, the MATIC price experienced a sharp reversal from the $0.89 resistance and tumbled 22.5% within three weeks. With an intraday loss of 1%, the daily chart hints at an

item.title: XRPL Transaction Scanner Floats New Developer Portal

item.description:
The XRP Ledger (XRPL) transaction scanner, a cutting-edge tool that allows real-time monitoring and analysis of XRP on the ledger, has taken a significant leap forward by launching its new and improved developer portal, the XRPSCAN API platform. item.title: XRP Price Analysis: Bullish Chart Pattern Ignites a 32% Upswing
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
XRP Price Analysis: Responding to the stagnant behavior of crypto market leaders Bitcoin and Ethereum, the XRP coin shows sloppy price action above the $0.672 support. The daily candles with short bodies and longer wicks on either side indicate uncertainty among market participants. However, despite a highly volatile sentiment the coin price respects the formation

item.title: Breaking: US SEC Sues Richard Heart for Selling Unregistered HEX Securities
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
In another emphatic crackdown move, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has filed a lawsuit against Richard Schueler aka Richard Heart, the founder of the HEX and PulseChain protocol for the sales of unregistered securities. The SEC Case Against Heart According to the markets regulator, Heart raised as much as $1 billion in

The post Breaking: US SEC Sues Richard Heart for Selling Unregistered HEX Securities appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic Community Set To Burn 800 Million Tokens, LUNC And USTC To $1?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The Terra Luna Classic community favors burning 800 million USTC tokens linked to Ozone Protocol rather than returning them to the community pool. Validators and some members have introduced a counter-proposal to prominent member Vegas’ proposal to return the 800 million USTC tokens back to the community pool. Terra Luna Classic Proposal To Burn 800

The post Terra Luna Classic Community Set To Burn 800 Million Tokens, LUNC And USTC To $1? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic Key Governance And Decentralization Proposal Officially Passed
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic community passed a key proposal enhancing governance and decentralization in the transition to the Commonwealth forum. With the proposal submitted by Terra Luna Classic validator Happy Catty Crypto now passed, current Commonwealth administrators need to revoke their rights and pass access to Joint L1 Task Force developer Vinh Nguyen. Terra Luna Classic

The post LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic Key Governance And Decentralization Proposal Officially Passed appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic community passed a key proposal enhancing governance and decentralization in the transition to the Commonwealth forum. With the proposal submitted by Terra Luna Classic validator Happy Catty Crypto now passed, current Commonwealth administrators need to revoke their rights and pass access to Joint L1 Task Force developer Vinh Nguyen. Terra Luna Classic

item.title: Ethereum Price Analysis: Will Megaphone Pattern Trigger a New Recovery Cycle to $2200?
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Ethereum Price Analysis: Amid the increasing FUD in the crypto market, the Ethereum price correction phase stalled at the support of the megaphone pattern near the $1830 mark. This support was expected to bolster buyers for a bullish reversal, but the price trend turned sideways. The consolidation reflects a weakness in bullish momentum as buyers

The post Ethereum Price Analysis: Will Megaphone Pattern Trigger a New Recovery Cycle to $2200? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Nigerian SEC Calls Binance Operations Illegal in the Country
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance faces one more regulatory roadblock and this time it’s in the African country of Nigeria. Last week, Nigeria’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) called Binance’s operations as illegal in the country. The SEC issued a notice on Friday, July 28, ordering all crypto platform providers to cease soliciting Nigerian

The post Nigerian SEC Calls Binance Operations Illegal in the Country appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
